com.ubudu.sdk

Class UbuduAreaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduAreaManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UbuduBeaconManager, UbuduGeofenceManager

    public class UbuduAreaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Root interface for other managers

      • setEnableAutomaticUserNotificationSending

        public void setEnableAutomaticUserNotificationSending(boolean enable)
        Allow/disallow automatic user notification sending (allowed by default). The user notifications have a text (or a SDK provided default text), and embed an url to be open and/or a PassBook url to be open when the user selects the notification.
        Parameters:
        enable - automatic user notification flag

      • automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled

        public boolean automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if automatic user notification is enabled.

      • areaIsMonitored

        public boolean areaIsMonitored(UbuduArea area)
        determine if an area is "monitored" (when the current position is close enough of the area, and the current time is within the start/end dates and scheduled open times).
        Parameters:
        area - area to check
        Returns:
        true if the given area is monitored.

      • notifyUserForEvent

        public void notifyUserForEvent(UbuduEvent event)

      • actionsCustomExecutedForEvent

        public void actionsCustomExecutedForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
        This method must be called after the event was handled in a custom way on the application's side so the SDKs posts proper logs to the back office.
        Parameters:
        event - event which actions have been custom executed
